name: Makeup By Sunshine
tag_list: makeup-artist, make-up-airbrush, wedding, airbrushing, philadelphia, new-jersey, deleware, pennsylvania, chester-springs, exton, downingtown, king-of-prussia, northeast, tanning, licensed, aesthetician, esthetician, waxing, beauty, special-effects, film
overview:
Makeup By Sunshine, L.L.C. provides the highest level of training and excellence for all on-location film, HD television, events, fashion, print, or specialty makeup needs.

Sunshine Jones has been serving the East Coast as a highly skilled creative makeup artist for the past twelve years. Sunshine has been hired to design and apply various professional makeup looks and designs for film, HD television, print, weddings, runway and special events for local, national and international clients. ABC News, ESPN Cold Pizza, The Golf Channel, The FBI, and PBS are just a few of her esteemed clients.

As Jacksonville’s first airbrush makeup artist, Sunshine also specializes in the hottest airbrush techniques for bridal and commercials which increase speed are waterproof, last longer and are more hygienic than traditional application.

Sunshine Jones has studied with and apprenticed with celebrity makeup artists and continues her education with Master Classes with MAC, Airmakeup, Bobbi Brown, Kett, and International Shows. She is also a licensed paramedical aesthetician and insured through the ASCP (Association of Skin Care Professionals).

Sunshine believes a good artist is always looking for inspiration and will never stop learning. As well as learning, Jones believes in giving back and teaches classes privately as well as in academic settings to give back to the community and raise up the next generation of makeup artists with the integrity and skills they will need to succeed.

Sunshine Jones strives to continually provide an elite level of professionalism, quality, and excellence on every job from the National and International Forum to the girl next door.
